Klasse BaseClientJsonInterpreter

java.lang.Object
network.interpreters.BaseClientJsonInterpreter
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
JsonInterpreter
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
AIJsonInterpreter, ClientJsonInterpreter
public abstract class BaseClientJsonInterpreter extends Object implements JsonInterpreter
An abstract base client-side JSON interpreter responsible for handling incoming JSON messages from the server. Specific client implementations can extend this class and modify or add handlers as needed.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • BaseClientJsonInterpreter

      public BaseClientJsonInterpreter(BaseClient client, Logger logger)
      Constructs a BaseClientJsonInterpreter with the specified client and logger. Initializes the default set of handlers by calling initializeHandlers().
      Parameter:
      client - the BaseClient instance that will send and receive messages
      logger - a Logger for logging

  • Methodendetails

    • interpretMessage

      public void interpretMessage(String jsonMessage)
      Interprets an incoming JSON message by looking up its messageType in the handlerMap. If a matching handler is found, it is executed. Otherwise, logs a warning about an unknown message type.
      Angegeben von:
      interpretMessage in Schnittstelle JsonInterpreter
      Parameter:
      jsonMessage - the raw JSON string received from the server

    • initializeHandlers

      protected void initializeHandlers()
      Registers the common handlers. Subclasses may override or add additional handlers as needed.

    • modifyHandlers

      protected abstract void modifyHandlers()
